original_title: No revision in Laugfs Gas prices in December
original_body_lines: The Laugfs Gas PLC has also decided not to revise its prices in the month of December, mirroring Litro Gas Lanka’s move.
As such, both companies have decided against a price revision in December, in view of the upcoming festive season.
There was no revision in the prices of domestic LP gas cylinders of Laugfs Gas in November either.
Following the rate hike in October, the prices of Laugfs domestic gas cylinders currently remain at the rates mentioned below:
